name: EssayEdge
tag_list: essay-editing, essay-help, essay-editing-service, essay-editing-services, personal-statement-editing, personal-statement-help, mba, medical-school-essay, law-essay
overview:
EssayEdge is an online-based editing service provider. EssayEdge services include editing for sample personal statements, admissions essays, and application essays.

EssayEdge offers assistance in undergraduate, graduate, business, law, and medical school essays. The company employs over 200 Harvard-educated editors and offers free sample admission essays, college application essay help courses, and a free statement of purpose guides.

EssayEdge is part of the CyberEdit network and has been named the premier college admissions essay editing service by the New York Times.
